definition: a heavy dull sound (as made by impact of heavy objects), strike with a dull sound
details:
noun
- a heavy dull sound (as made by impact of heavy objects)
= synonyms: thump
verb
- strike with a dull sound
= example: strike with a dull sound
- make a dull sound
= example: make a dull sound
= synonyms: thump
- make a noise typical of an engine lacking lubricants
= synonyms: scrunch
